desc: Schedules a message to be sent to a channel.

channel.desc: Channel, private group, or DM channel to send message to. Can be an encoded ID, or a name.

post_at.desc: Unix EPOCH timestamp of time in future to send the message.

as_user.desc: Pass true to post the message as the authed user, instead of as a bot. Defaults to false. See `chat.postMessage`.

attachments.desc: A JSON-based array of structured attachments, presented as a URL-encoded string.

blocks.desc: A JSON-based array of structured blocks, presented as a URL-encoded string.

link_names.desc: Find and link channel names and usernames.

parse.desc: Change how messages are treated. Defaults to none. See `chat.postMessage`.

reply_broadcast.desc: Used in conjunction with `thread_ts` and indicates whether reply should be made visible to everyone in the channel or conversation. Defaults to `false`.

thread_ts.desc: Provide another message's `ts` value to make this message a reply. Avoid using a reply's `ts` value; use its parent instead.

unfurl_links.desc: Pass true to enable unfurling of primarily text-based content.

unfurl_media.desc: Pass false to disable unfurling of media content.

message.text: Here's a message for you in the future

errors.time_in_past: value passed for `post_time` was in the past.
errors.time_too_far: value passed for `post_time` was too far into the future.
errors.not_in_channel: Cannot post user messages to a channel they are not in.
errors.restricted_action: A workspace preference prevents the authenticated user from posting.
errors.restricted_action_read_only_channel: Cannot post any message into a read-only channel.
errors.restricted_action_thread_only_channel: Cannot post top-level messages into a thread-only channel.
errors.restricted_action_non_threadable_channel: Cannot post thread replies into a non_threadable channel.
errors.too_many_attachments: Too many attachments were provided with this message. A maximum of 100 attachments are allowed on a message.
errors.rate_limited: Application has posted too many messages, read the Rate Limit documentation for more information
errors.invalid_auth: Some aspect of authentication cannot be validated. Either the provided token is invalid or the request originates from an IP address disallowed from making the request.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or workspace.
errors.token_revoked: Authentication token is for a deleted user or workspace or the app has been removed.
errors.no_permission: The workspace token used in this request does not have the permissions necessary to complete the request. Make sure your app is a member of the conversation it's attempting to post a message to.
errors.org_login_required: The workspace is undergoing an enterprise migration and will not be available until migration is complete.
errors.ekm_access_denied: Administrators have suspended the ability to post a message.
errors.missing_scope: The token used is not granted the specific scope permissions required to complete this request.
errors.invalid_arguments: The method was called with invalid arguments.
errors.invalid_arg_name: The method was passed an argument whose name falls outside the bounds of accepted or expected values. This includes very long names and names with non-alphanumeric characters other than _. If you get this error, it is typically an indication that you have made a very malformed API call.
errors.invalid_charset: The method was called via a `POST` request, but the `charset` specified in the `Content-Type` header was invalid. Valid charset names are: `utf-8` `iso-8859-1`.
errors.invalid_form_data: The method was called via a `POST` request with `Content-Type` `application/x-www-form-urlencoded` or `multipart/form-data`, but the form data was either missing or syntactically invalid.
errors.invalid_post_type: The method was called via a `POST` request, but the specified `Content-Type` was invalid. Valid types are: `application/json` `application/x-www-form-urlencoded` `multipart/form-data` `text/plain`.
errors.missing_post_type: The method was called via a `POST` request and included a data payload, but the request did not include a `Content-Type` header.
errors.team_added_to_org: The workspace associated with your request is currently undergoing migration to an Enterprise Organization. Web API and other platform operations will be intermittently unavailable until the transition is complete.
errors.request_timeout: The method was called via a `POST` request, but the `POST` data was either missing or truncated.
errors.fatal_error: The server could not complete your operation(s) without encountering a catastrophic error. It's possible some aspect of the operation succeeded before the error was raised.

warnings.message_truncated: The `text` field of a message should have no more than 40,000 characters. We truncate really long messages.
warnings.missing_charset: The method was called via a `POST` request, and recommended practice for the specified `Content-Type` is to include a `charset` parameter. However, no `charset` was present. Specifically, non-form-data content types (e.g. `text/plain`) are the ones for which `charset` is recommended.
warnings.superfluous_charset: The method was called via a `POST` request, and the specified `Content-Type` is not defined to understand the `charset` parameter. However, `charset` was in fact present. Specifically, form-data content types (e.g. `multipart/form-data`) are the ones for which `charset` is superfluous.
